short_summary: Tumble belt blast system unit needed for abrasive blast work center.
description: The Government of Canada has a requirement for one (1) tumble belt blast system unit to be used in the abrasive blast work center at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB), a DND establishment responsible for Engineering, Maintenance and Repair of the Pacific Naval Fleet for the Royal Canadian Navy (RCN).
full_summary:
Government of Canada Tender Announcement: Tumble Belt Blast System
=============================================================

### Tender Details

*   **CIA Number**: W3555-233920
*   **Title**: Tumble Belt Blast System
*   **Amendment Number**: 1

### Government Tender Reference

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3569506361
*   **Publication Date**: November 3, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 5, 2022, at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: September 2, 2022

### Tender Status and Availability

*   **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
*   **Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
*   **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
*   **Selection Criteria**: Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)

### Goods or Services

*   **UNSPSC Code**: 23280000 (Metal treatment machinery)
*   **UNSPSC Description**: Machines pour le traitement des métaux (Metal treatment machinery)

### Government Contact Information

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau (Québec), K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Phone**: None
*   **Email**: kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice and Access

*   **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14541439?extsite=MTQ1NDE0MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The Government of Canada announces a tender for the procurement of one unit of tumble belt blast system for use in the abrasive blast work center at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB), a Department of National Defence establishment. The required unit will be used for the Engineering, Maintenance, and Repair of the Pacific Naval Fleet for the Royal Canadian Navy.

Bidders shall meet the tender requirements and deadlines as specified in the tender documentation available on Buyandsell.gc.ca. The procurement is open to all qualified bidders in accordance with the Canadian Trade Agreements.
